description: Try our easy to follow Puy Lentil & Butter Bean Salad With Chilli Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Puy Lentil & Butter Bean Salad With Chilli Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can Puy lentils, rinsed and drained
400g can butter beans, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Put the lentils and butter beans in a large serving bowl, then add the onion, cherry tomatoes and parsley.
Mix together all the dressing ingredients in a small bowl, then pour over the salad, toss to mix well and serve.
